list.abs: 放字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 放松〖 relax;slacken;loosen〗 放下〖 putdown;laydown〗 放下包袱〖 dropaloadonone'smind〗.
动词与介词搭配的短语归类有哪些？ - 已解决 ... ... passdown 传下来 putdown 记下，写下，镇压 calmdown 平静下来.

means.word_mean: 1. (of a book) so poorly written and unentertaining as to be easily put down

baesInfo.translate_result: unputdownable<口>（指书等）爱不忍释的，不忍释手的
